mapper.update: update ht_client set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLIENTID = #{clientid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKNO = #{workno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pharmacyno = #{pharmacyno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WINDOWNO = #{windowno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, CLIENTID, WORKNO, REALNAME, USERID, pharmacyno, WINDOWNO from ht_client where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, CLIENTID, WORKNO, REALNAME, USERID, pharmacyno, WINDOWNO from ht_client
